updates.title: Supervisor Hub Enters Production Phase
updates.description: Our AI oversight platform is now handling live transactions, providing real-time monitoring and compliance validation for autonomous banking agents.

updates.title: Agent Lab Expands Testing Framework
updates.description: Added new simulation capabilities for testing AI agents in complex multi-party banking scenarios, including edge cases for regulatory compliance.

updates.title: Shift AI Performance Milestone
updates.description: Platform now processes over 50,000 intelligent automation tasks daily across customer service, fraud detection, and document processing workflows.

updates.title: Speaking at Digital Banking Innovation Summit
updates.description: Presented on 'Building Trust in Agentic AI: Lessons from Banking' - discussing the balance between autonomy and oversight in financial services.

updates.title: New AI Strategy Workshop Series
updates.description: Launching internal program to train product teams on AI integration, focusing on practical implementation and ethical considerations in banking.
